content: You are going to permanently delete the <1>{{domain}}</1> space. This action cannot be undone.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when deleting an empty portal space. It informs users that the action is permanent and cannot be undone, appearing in a delete confirmation dialog or button.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'دائم' (da'im) translates to 'permanent' but in this context, it doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'permanently delete'. It sounds a bit awkward. A better translation would capture the 'permanently delete' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم حذف المساحة <1>{{domain}}</1> بشكل نهائي. (Sayyutimu halafu al-masaha <1>{{domain}}</1> bishaklin niha'i.) - This translates to 'The space <1>{{domain}}</1> will be permanently deleted.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The formatting of the placeholders (<1>{{domain}}</1>) is consistent in both the English and Arabic, which is good.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: N/A

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag `<1>{{domain}}</1>` is not properly closed. The original English uses `<1>{{domain}}</1>`. While the Azerbaijani translation maintains the `<1>` tag, the `</1>` should ideally also exist.

The German translation "Sie sind dabei, den <1>{{domain}}</1>-Bereich." is incomplete. It lacks a verb indicating the action being performed (e.g., "löschen", "entfernen").  It implies the user *is* deleting the space but doesn't explicitly state the action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie sind dabei, den <1>{{domain}}</1>-Bereich zu löschen. Diese Aktion kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation lacks proper sentence structure. It's missing a necessary verb to form a complete sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie sind dabei, den <1>{{domain}}</1>-Bereich zu löschen. Diese Aktion kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'supprimer' while technically meaning 'delete', can sound abrupt in this context. 'Effacer' might be a more appropriate choice for a softer tone, especially when dealing with user actions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous allez effacer définitivement l'espace <1>{{domain}}</1>. Cette action ne peut être annulée.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation maintains the <1>{{domain}}</1> tags from the English, which is generally acceptable but might be slightly unusual depending on the system's handling of tags. It's worth confirming if this is the intended behavior.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify if the <1>{{domain}}</1> tags need to be present in the Armenian translation. If not, remove them.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation includes "con tutti i dati e gli account memorizzati" (with all data and accounts stored) which is not present in the English source. While it may be an attempt to clarify, it adds information not contained in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more direct translation that reflects only what's present in the English text, such as "Stai per eliminare definitivamente lo spazio <1>{{domain}}</1>. Questa azione non può essere annullata." or "Stai per eliminare definitivamente lo spazio <1>{{domain}}</1>. L'operazione non è reversibile."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'pr' is likely a typo and should be 'per'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'pr' with 'per'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "You are going to permanently delete" is not accurately translated. "削除しようとしています" (sakujo shiyou to shiteimasu) implies an attempt to delete, rather than the actual permanent deletion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 変更しようとしています (henkou shiyou to shiteimasu) - 'You are going to change...' or 削除されます (sakujo saremasu) - 'will be deleted'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation maintains the <1>{{domain}}</1> tags, which is consistent with the English. However, consider whether this is the desired behavior for Japanese UI/UX. It may be more natural to remove the tags or adapt them to a Japanese-appropriate format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Evaluate whether to remove the tags or adjust to a more culturally appropriate format (e.g., using a different wrapping element or phrasing).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "영구적으로 삭제하려고 합니다" is a bit awkward and could be more naturally translated. It literally translates to 'I am going to permanently delete'. A more natural phrasing would be '영구 삭제됩니다' or '영구적으로 삭제될 예정입니다'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 영구 삭제됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "space" is translated as "obszar roboczy". While technically correct, "obszar roboczy" carries a connotation of a workspace or working area that might be misleading in this context. 'Przestrzeń' would be a more accurate translation for 'space' in this UI context, referring to a digital space or portal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zamierzasz trwale usunąć przestrzeń <1>{{domain}}</1>. Nie można cofnąć tej czynności.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'You are going to permanently delete' is too literal and awkward in Portuguese. A more natural phrasing would be 'O espaço <1>{{domain}}</1> será excluído permanentemente.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O espaço <1>{{domain}}</1> será excluído permanentemente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'This action cannot be undone' translates too literally to 'Essa ação não pode ser desfeita'. A more idiomatic expression would be 'Esta ação é irreversível'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Esta ação é irreversível.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ștergeți' (delete - reflexive) implies the user is deleting themselves, not the portal space. A more appropriate translation would be 'veți elimina' or 'veți șterge' (without the reflexive).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Intenționați să eliminați definitiv spațiul <1>{{domain}}</1>. Această acțiune nu poate fi anulată.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "නිවනීමට" (nivanimitu) implies cessation or extinguishing, which doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of "delete" in this context. A more accurate translation for "delete" would be something like "හෝද කිරීම" (hoda karima) or "උපුලුවත් කිරීම" (upuluvath karima).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "නිවනීමට" with "හෝද කිරීම" or "උපුලුවත් කිරීම".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. While understandable, it can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring to something like: "ඔබ <1>{{domain}}</1> ස්ථානය වහාම හෝදීමට යමින් සිටිති. මෙම ක්‍රියාව අවබද්ධ කිරීමට නොහැකිය." or "<1>{{domain}}</1> ස්ථානය වහාම ඔබ හෝදීමට යමින් සිටිති. මෙම ක්‍රියාව අවබද්ධ කිරීමට නොහැකිය."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Перманенто" (Permanento) is not a standard Serbian word. It appears to be a direct transliteration of "permanently". The correct Serbian word for "permanently" in this context would be "трајно" (trajno).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: трајно ћете обрисати простор

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses 'Permanento ćete obrisati' which is not the most natural way to express 'You are going to permanently delete'. A more natural phrasing would be 'Trajno ćete obrisati'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trajno ćete obrisati prostor <1>{{domain}}</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'opozvati' is technically correct but 'ponovo vratiti' might be more readily understood by a broader audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ova akcija se ne može ponovo vratiti.
